thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: I ordered fruit trees last fall to be delivered in the spring. My complaint is that they gave me one day notice before sending them out for delivery. Had it been one week later, I would have been out of town for a week and the trees probably would have died. Weather was my biggest concern with the delivery. I was able to contact Willis Orchard regarding the snow we were about to receive and planting instructions for freezing weather. I ended up contacting them twice with quick follow up on their part and great instructions. So excellent customer service but a miss on notification. I would still order from them again. The trees seemed to be in great shape upon arrival and hopefully they will do well.
